mapper.insert: insert into PARAM_OD_ROUTE_ACCESSIBLE (ID, VERSION_CODE, O_STATION_CODE, D_STATION_CODE, ROUTE_NO, ROUTE_LINE_CODE, ROUTE_STATION_CODE, ROUTE_STATION_TIME, ROUTE_DISTANCE, ROUTE_STATION_NO, COST_TIME, IMPEDANCE_TIME, ROUTE_TRANSFER_CODE, ROUTE_TRANSFER_TIME, ROUTE_TRANSFER_FREQUENCY ) values (SEQ_OD_ROUTE_ACCES.NEXTVAL, #{versionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oStationCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dStationCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{routeNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{routeLineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routeStationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routeStationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routeDistance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{routeStationNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{costTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{impedanceTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{routeTransferCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routeTransferTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routeTransferFrequency,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

insert into PARAM_OD_ROUTE_ACCESSIBLE
ID,
VERSION_CODE,
O_STATION_CODE,
D_STATION_CODE,
ROUTE_NO,
ROUTE_LINE_CODE,
ROUTE_STATION_CODE,
ROUTE_STATION_TIME,
ROUTE_DISTANCE,
ROUTE_STATION_NO,
COST_TIME,
IMPEDANCE_TIME,
ROUTE_TRANSFER_CODE,
ROUTE_TRANSFER_TIME,
ROUTE_TRANSFER_FREQUENCY,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{versionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{oStationCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{dStationCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{routeNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{routeLineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{routeStationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{routeStationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{routeDistance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{routeStationNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{costTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{impedanceTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{routeTransferCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{routeTransferTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{routeTransferFrequency,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.select:
select count(1) from PARAM_OD_ROUTE_ACCESSIBLE where VERSION_CODE = #{versionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and rownum =1

select t.* from PARAM_OD_ROUTE_ACCESSIBLE t, param_rule_effective e, (select oa.o_station_code, oa.d_station_code, case when oa.impedance_time * r.impe_prop_limit > oa.impedance_time + (r.impe_value_limit * 60) then oa.impedance_time + (r.impe_value_limit * 60) else oa.impedance_time * r.impe_prop_limit end imp_time from PARAM_OD_ROUTE_ACCESSIBLE oa, param_rule_effective r where oa.version_code = #{odRouteAccessibleVersionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and r.version_code = #{ruleEffectiveVersionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and oa.route_no = 1) c where t.version_code = #{odRouteAccessibleVersionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and e.version_code = #{ruleEffectiveVersionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.route_no <= e.k_num and t.o_station_code = c.o_station_code and t.d_station_code = c.d_station_code and t.impedance_time < c.imp_time
